startText.en:
Thank you [firstName] for taking part in the PLAN-psoriasis feasibility trial.

We’re asking everyone to complete a survey every 3 months during the PLAN-psoriasis feasibility trial.

Your information will help us to understand whether your treatment plan is effective and acceptable.

Thank you so much for your important contribution.

The PLAN-psoriasis team
Email: PLAN@kcl.ac.uk

endText.en:
Thank you [firstName] for completing your first of 3 baseline surveys for the PLAN-psoriasis trial.

Please now return to the home page and complete the second survey entitled 'Treatment experience'.

text.en: It seems you haven't answered all of our questions. Could you please do that now?

body.en:
Hello [firstName],

Thank you for your ongoing participation in the PLAN-psoriasis feasibility trial. We're asking everyone to complete the questionnaire every 3 months during the study. Your contribution is vital for us to understand whether your treatment plan is effective and acceptable. This is a friendly reminder that you have a questionnaire waiting for your valuable input. 
Survey Title: Psoriasis

To complete the survey, please open mySkin app and start the survey.

We're looking forward to receiving your survey. If you have already completed the survey, we sincerely thank you for your cooperation.

Thank you again,

The PLAN-psoriasis team

Email: PLAN@kcl.ac.uk

text.en: A new Psoriasis questionnaire is available for you.

startText.en: In the PLAN-psoriasis feasibility trial, you have been selected to take your biologic 'as needed' (at the first sign of recurrence of your psoriasis).

endText.en:
Thank you [firstName] for taking the time to complete the PLAN-psoriasis feasibility trial survey.

We would like to ask you to take photos of your skin and upload the photos to our secure database.
We will use the photos to assess how active your psoriasis is, and to help develop accurate digital skin assessment methods.

This is optional and does not affect your medical care or the rest of your participation in the study.

Would you like to submit photos?

startText.en: In the PLAN-psoriasis feasibility trial, you have been selected to take your biologic at a personalised frequency based on the concentration of drug in your blood. This is called therapeutic drug monitoring guided treatment.

endText.en:
Thank you [firstName] for taking the time to complete the PLAN-psoriasis feasibility trial survey.

We would like to ask you to take photos of your skin and upload the photos to our secure database.
We will use the photos to assess how active your psoriasis is, and to help develop accurate digital skin assessment methods.

This is optional and does not affect your medical care or the rest of your participation in the study.

Would you like to submit photos?

title.en: Missed Log my biologic injection questionnaire?

text.en: It seems you haven't answered all of our questions. Could you please do that now?

body.en:
Hello [firstName],

Thank you for your ongoing participation in the PLAN-psoriasis feasibility trial. We're asking everyone to complete the questionnaire at a personalised frequency based on the concentration of drug in your blood. Your contribution is vital for us to understand whether your treatment plan is effective and acceptable. This is a friendly reminder that you have a questionnaire waiting for your valuable input. 
Survey Title: Log my biologic injection

To complete the survey, please open mySkin app and start the survey.

We're looking forward to receiving your survey. If you have already completed the survey, we sincerely thank you for your cooperation.

Thank you again,

The PLAN-psoriasis team

startText.en:
Hello [firstName],

Thank you for taking part in the PLAN-psoriasis feasibility trial and for requesting an ad hoc clinic visit.

We’re asking everyone who requests an ad hoc clinic visit to complete the following survey. Your doctor will then complete a full assessment at your clinic visit and discuss with you whether any changes to your treatment plan are advised.

We look forward to seeing you in clinic.

Thank you for your important contribution to psoriasis research.

endText.en:
Thank you [firstName] for taking the time to complete the PLAN-psoriasis feasibility trial survey.

We would like to ask you to take photos of your skin and upload the photos to our secure database.
We will use the photos to assess how active your psoriasis is, and to help develop accurate digital skin assessment methods.

This is optional and does not affect your medical care or the rest of your participation in the study.

Would you like to submit photos?

protocols.name: sample_blood_instructions_2.0.0
protocols.label: How to take a blood sample

startText.en:
The following steps explain how to take a blood sample at home.

Scan the QR code to watch our step-by-step guide.

Please collect and post the blood sample on a Monday, Tuesday or Wednesday.

Get in touch with the study team if you have questions (myskin@kcl.ac.uk).
